Text: Thanks! This is my favourite electronic compilation and has been that for a long time now. I'm gonna seed for a while so this can live on. Good work mate!

I see that I've misplaced the folder and for some reason file information shows that there are some minor parts missing on three songs, but I haven't noticed any problems with listening to this. The affected songs are
03 - Chromeo - Me And My Man (2007 Mix).mp3 
05 - The Automatic - Monster (Robot Revamp).mp3
11 - Madonna - Deeper & Deeper (Electro-pop mix).mp3
but as I said my ear hasn't heard any defects. Hope you who download can enjoy this as much as me even though the file is stuck at 99.2%.

Hi, i've re-seeded it, hope it works ok! If you want to hear more remixes and productions, go over to soundcloud.com/acidsoul.

Thanks for your feedback!

Hey JNR. Been trying to get hold of a few of these mixes for while. Now that I find this site, there appears to be no seeders!!!

Anyone who has it, please please seed, pref before this coming weekend (St Patrick's Day!!!), got a party I'd like to use a few of them at...

Cheers.
